content.rendered:
Kteco F22 Fingerprint Reader

ultra-thin fingerprint time attendance and access control terminal with BioID sensor and Wi-Fi, which offers unparalleled performance with advanced algorithm for reliability, precision and excellent matching speed. F22 features the fastest commercial-based fingerprint matching algorithm and ZK high-performance, high-image quality infrared detection fingerprint sensor.
F22 provides a superior touching experience with touch keypad, and offers flexibility for standalone installation or with any third-party access control panel that supports standard wiegand signal. TCP/IP, RS485 and Wi-Fi are also available that the device can be used in different networks.

excerpt.rendered:
ZKteco F22 Fingerprint Reader

  • Fingerprints : 3 000
  • Cards : 5 000
  • Transactions : 30 000
  • Communication : TCP/IP, RS485 & USB Host
  • Power : 12VDC 3A
  • Wiegand : In & Out
